basics.name: Jinjun Liu
basics.summary: A motivated Ph.D. candidate in atmospheric sciences at Texas A&M, with a strong foundation in computer science demonstrated by a master's degree from Georgia Tech. Passionate about integrating computer science and climate research, seeking an internship/full-time job in weather, climate, machine learning, data science, or software engineering to leverage academic expertise and technical skills to pursue meaningful solutions.

education.institution: University of Science and Technology of China
University of Science and Technology of China
